Other.name: Aluminum Scrap
Other.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Other.name: Black Powder
Other.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

Other.name: Concrete
Other.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

Other.name: Empty Canister
Other.description: Used to package fluids for transportation. Can be recycled.

Other.name: Filter
Other.description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

Other.name: Flower Petals
Other.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

Other.name: Green Power Slug
Other.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

Other.name: HUB Parts
Other.description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

Other.name: Leaves
Other.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Other.name: Packaged Fuel
Other.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Fuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Other.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Other.description: Packaged Turbofuel, a more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in vehicles.

Other.name: Petroleum Coke
Other.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

Other.name: Polymer Resin
Other.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Other.name: Purple Power Slug
Other.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

Other.name: Solid Biofuel
Other.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of solid biomass.

Other.name: Wood
Other.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Other.name: Yellow Power Slug
Other.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

Standard Parts.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
Standard Parts.description: Thin lightweight & highly durable sheet that is mainly used for products that need to be light or have high heat conduction.

Standard Parts.name: Cable
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

Standard Parts.name: Copper Sheet
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Standard Parts.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
Standard Parts.description: Control Rods regulate power expenditure via electromagnetism.

Standard Parts.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Standard Parts.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Standard Parts.name: Iron Plate
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Standard Parts.name: Iron Rod
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Standard Parts.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Standard Parts.name: Rotor
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

Standard Parts.name: Screw
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Standard Parts.name: Stator
Standard Parts.description: The static parts of a motor

Standard Parts.name: Steel Beam
Standard Parts.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Standard Parts.name: Steel Pipe
Standard Parts.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Standard Parts.name: Wire
Standard Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Power.name: Battery
Power.description: Batteries store an electrical charge. They are primarily used as a power source.

Power.name: Power Shard
Power.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Nuclear.name: Iodine Infused Filter
Nuclear.description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

Nuclear.name: Nuclear Fuel Rod
Nuclear.description:
Nuclear Fuel Rods are used as fuel in nuclear reactors.
VERY RADIOACTIVE

Ammo.name: Color Cartridge
Ammo.description:
Ammo for the Color Gun.
Necessary to change the color of factory buildings and vehicles.

Ammo.name: Nobelisk
Ammo.description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

Ingots.name: Aluminum Ingot
Ingots.description: Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap. It is mostly used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Ingots.name: Caterium Ingot
Ingots.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Ingots.name: Copper Ingot
Ingots.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Ingots.name: Iron Ingot
Ingots.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Ingots.name: Steel Ingot
Ingots.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Space Elevator Parts.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Space Elevator Parts.description: Project Part #5. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Space Elevator Parts.name: Automated Wiring
Space Elevator Parts.description: Project Part #3. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Space Elevator Parts.name: Modular Engine
Space Elevator Parts.description: Project Part #4. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Space Elevator Parts.name: Smart Plating
Space Elevator Parts.description: Project Part #1. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Space Elevator Parts.name: Versatile Framework
Space Elevator Parts.description: Project Part #2. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Industrial Parts.name: Modular Frame
Industrial Parts.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

Industrial Parts.name: Motor
Industrial Parts.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Industrial Parts.name: Turbo Motor
Industrial Parts.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

Materials.name: Biomass
Materials.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy efficient than raw biological matter.

Materials.name: Fabric
Materials.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

Materials.name: Plastic
Materials.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Materials.name: Quartz Crystal
Materials.description: Used for radar and quantum technology.

Materials.name: Rubber
Materials.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

Materials.name: Silica
Materials.description: Derived from quartz, commonly used in structural materials and microelectronics.

Electronics.name: A.I. Limiter
Electronics.description: A.I. Limiter are super advanced electronics that are used to control A.I.s and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

Electronics.name: Circuit Board
Electronics.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Electronics.name: Computer
Electronics.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

Electronics.name: Crystal Oscillator
Electronics.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Electronics.name: High-Speed Connector
Electronics.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

Electronics.name: Quickwire
Electronics.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Electronics.name: Supercomputer
Electronics.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

Liquids.name: Alumina Solution
Liquids.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into pure Aluminum.

Liquids.name: Crude Oil
Liquids.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Liquids.name: Fuel
Liquids.description: Fuel is either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Liquids.name: Heavy Oil Residue
Liquids.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Liquids.name: Liquid Biofuel
Liquids.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of biomass.

Liquids.name: Sulfuric Acid
Liquids.description: A liquid mostly used to extract elements from ore.

Liquids.name: Turbofuel
Liquids.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators.

Packaged.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
Packaged.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport.

Packaged.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
Packaged.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Liquid Biofuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

Alien.name: Alien Carapace
Alien.description: Thick and sturdy natural armor plates from alien creatures.

Alien.name: Mycelia
Alien.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Equipment.name: Bacon Agaric
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

Equipment.name: Beacon
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

Equipment.name: Beryl Nut
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

Equipment.name: Blade Runners
Equipment.description:
Slot: Body

A exoskeleton for your lower legs that assist your movement, allowing you to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

Equipment.name: Chainsaw
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Fuel: Biofuel

Used to clear an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

Equipment.name: Color Gun
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Color Cartridge

Paints factory buildings and vehicles. The color can be adjusted prior to painting.

Equipment.name: Factory Cart™
Equipment.description:
The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart™
Now with special - FICIST Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

Equipment.name: Gas mask
Equipment.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to breathe normally in poison gas. Consumes Filters from your inventory when you are in poison gas.

Equipment.name: Hazmat Suit
Equipment.description:
Slot: Body

Shields you from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine Infused Filters from your inventory when you are in radioactive areas.

Equipment.name: Jetpack
Equipment.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to move more freely in the air. Consumes Fuel when used and refills with Fuel from your inventory when you're on the ground.

Equipment.name: Medicinal Inhaler
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be inhaled to fully restore health.

Equipment.name: Nobelisk Detonator
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Nobelisk

Used to blow up cracked boulders, rocks and invasive vegetation.

Equipment.name: Object Scanner
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

Equipment.name: Paleberry
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

Equipment.name: Parachute
Equipment.description:
Slot: Body
Consumable

Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

Equipment.name: Portable Miner
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands

Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Very limited storage space.

Equipment.name: Rebar Gun
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Spiked Rebar

Improvised ranged weapon for self defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

Equipment.name: Rifle
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Cartridge

Rapid fire weapon for self-defense. Has a mag size of 10.

Equipment.name: Xeno-Basher
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands

Heavy electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

Equipment.name: Xeno-Zapper
Equipment.description:
Slot: Hands

Standard issue electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

Resources.name: Bauxite
Resources.description: Bauxite is turned into Aluminum Ingots via an advanced smelting process.

Resources.name: Caterium Ore
Resources.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Resources.name: Coal
Resources.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Resources.name: Compacted Coal
Resources.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

Resources.name: Copper Ore
Resources.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

Resources.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Resources.description:
Uranium Cells are concrete encased uranium pellets. Primarily used to make Nuclear Fuel Rods
Moderately radioactive.

Resources.name: Iron Ore
Resources.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Resources.name: Limestone
Resources.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

Resources.name: Packaged Oil
Resources.description: Crude Oil, packaged for transportation or to be used as vehicle fuel.

Resources.name: Raw Quartz
Resources.description: Raw Quartz is processed into Quartz Crystals which are used for radar and quantum technology.

Resources.name: Sulfur
Resources.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Gunpowder.

Resources.name: Uranium
Resources.description: Uranium is radioactive. Mainly used in Nuclear Power Plants.

Resources.name: Uranium Pellet
Resources.description:
Uranium Pellets are purified and casted from Uranium Ore. Primarily used to make Uranium Cells.
Moderately radioactive.
